programme.desc: Juan se enfrenta a Armando al saber que fue él quien golpeó a Franco, Fernando le explica a la familia Elizondo por qué existe un pleito entre ellos, a Jimena le cuenta lo que pasa con Rosario.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Jimena está deprimida, Leandro la convence de que cambie su actitud, pero Franco busca a Rosario en el bar. Armando tiene en la mira el negocio que quiere comprar y cómo deshacerse de su rival.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley refuse to go to bed until they hear the rest of the courtship story. Morticia resumes the tale via flashback, including the ceremony beginning with Ophelia Frump, Morticia's balmy sister, as the bride.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Romance seems close for Thing, the Addams right-hand-in-a-box, when Gomez's aunt arrives for a visit accompanied by Lady Fingers, her handmaiden. Thing enjoys the visit most because it gives him a chance to hold hands with one of his own kind.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez visit Mayor Henson to complain that their property tax is ridiculously low. After the Mayor proves his incompetence by offering a refund, Gomez is persuaded to become a candidate for the office.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: During a welcome home party for Cousin Itt, Morticia notices that the diminutive guest of honor seems to be losing his hair. Uncle Fester experiments with his chemistry set to produce a concoction that grows hair and tries the remedy on Itt.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: In need of artistic fulfillment, Morticia takes up sculpting. An art critic views her first endeavor--a three-eyed Gomez statue--and clubs it with his cane. Gomez, who won't have Morticia's heart broken gets a seedy art dealer to buy it.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley copies one of his dad's old love letters and sends it to his teacher. Miss Dunbar comes to visit the Addams home and confesses to Gomez that no man has ever fallen so in love with her, leading Morticia to pretend to be the jealous wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Wednesday befriends a new boy her age, Robespierre Courtney, Morticia invites his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Courtney to visit the Addams house for tea. Unbeknownst to them, the Courtney's are hoping to meet a number of the social set.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: There is a neighborhood burglar on the loose, and Morticia has reason to believe it could be Gomez. Morticia decides to probe his subconscious mind for a key to his criminality after she and Uncle Fester discover loot hidden in the storeroom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's pet plant Cleopatra gobbles up her favorite photo of Gomez from the family album. When the original photographer is found and asked to make a duplicate picture, it is discovered that he is now with the Department of Motor Vehicles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez plays host to Don Xavier Molines, a family friend during his childhood in Spain, and his daughter Consuella. Morticia's hospitality is put to the test when Consuella reveals that she has been promised in marriage to Gomez since childhood.

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Fester is so smitten upon receipt of a photo of his love, a bearded carnival lady, that he borrows stamp money to mail her a proposal. Morticia dons a beard and poses as the mother to convince Fester that he will have to work to support a wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Hair Raising Adventures

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Stuck on You
programme.desc: Today, Jack is counting down animals that count on each other! Birds that groom buffalo, lions that feed jackals, and catfish fed by bats are just some of the amazing symbiotic relationships on this Wild Countdown!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he discovers what it’s like to work in the wild thanks to six of the wildest guides ever. African Elephants, Hippos, Guanacos, Gorillas, Wildebeest, Zebra, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle for six daring adventures with the King of Beasts! From Lion Cubs in Kenya and rare White Lions in South Africa to a once-in-a-lifetime walk with lions in Zambia, come along for six daring adventures with the ultimate big cats.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack and his daughter Suzanne as they put their skills to the test at Shamwari's Ranger School where they must experience everything from driving a 4x4, to tracking animals on foot, including a very up-close look at a pride of hungry Lions.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In Costa Rica, Jack encounters reptiles including an Eye Lash Viper, a huge Python, and the deadly Bushmaster at the World of Snakes. On the Caribbean coast, Jack meets an American couple who has established the Sloth Rehabilitation Center.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for a journey with some of the animal kingdom's most outstanding omnivores! Baboons, Black Bears, Chimpanzees, two-toed Sloths and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Sue head to Rwanda for an incredible encounter with Golden Monkeys before getting a taste of the local fishing traditions, and they visit a primary school.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Tall Tails
programme.desc: If you’ve ever wondered why animals have tails, join Jungle Jack for today’s tales about tails! Some tails are dangerous, some are powerful, and some are critical for high-speed navigation. Dolphins, ccorpions, crocs, lemurs and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he crisscrosses the globe in search of animals who live in truly distinct habitats on the equator. Mountain gorillas, forest elephants, jaguars, orangutans, creatures from the Galapagos Islands, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In the south of Israel, the Hannas look at saving wildlife in the desert. Jack visits an ornithologist restoring a natural habitat in order to maintain an important fly-way for migratory birds.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Second Chances
programme.desc: Today, Jungle Jack is meeting several lucky creatures that are getting a second chance at survival, with a little help from their friends. Gibbons, horses, sloths, and even a pigeon!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Amazing Baby Animals
programme.desc: The cuddly and rambunctious world of baby animals is always filled with fun and surprises. From orangutans and manatees to mountain gorillas, join in as Jack counts down ten moments of magic and mayhem with animal babies!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Missing Person: Approximately 1.8 million Americans are reported missing each year. Worldwide, the number of missing persons nearly triples.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Tool marking: A tool used to commit a crime can often be the same tool used to solve it. The pattern a machine leaves on an item, the unusual way a tool crimps a wire, and even something as innocuous as the shape of a wood chip can lead to a killer.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Camera Clues
programme.desc: Forensic Photography: Forensic photographers are among the first people at a crime scene, capturing vital clues on film. What do the cameras capture that can't be seen first-hand, and who are the men and women who analyze the camera's clues?

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Most victims of multiple murderers are meticulously chosen because of a mutual connection with the killer or because they match an intricate set of criteria that fits the killer's MO.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When killers hide or destroy the remains of their victims, it becomes the mission of forensic scientists to reconstruct the scenes and prove murder for an absent witness.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Anytime, anywhere, people disappear – kidnapped from their daily routines. Predators always leave clues behind, but chasing them takes time, hampering investigators' attempts to solve these fatal abductions.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Formed in the 1830s to protect settlers against Indian attack, the Rangers became part of the Texas Highway Patrol in 1935. Their role has continued to evolve to keep up with changing times; today it includes sophisticated forensics labs.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When a murder is committed and deceit clouds the evidence, investigators turn to science and technology to uncover the truth and expose a murderous lie and capture the killer.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic scientists find clues written in blood as they investigate the deaths of three women killed by the men who once loved them.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In San Diego, California, a killer has left behind pieces of evidence. Detectives must sort through these small clues to prove murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: It is difficult to convict a murderer if the body can't be found. But forensic science is finding ways to do it. Devious killers can think up many was to dispose of their victim's remains, but they are often no matches for investigators.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When a theft is committed, something valuable is stolen. But when a criminal needs a new identity, theft becomes a matter of life and death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: No matter how chaotic or how clean a crime scene appears to be, the culprit is bound to leave something telling behind. Occasionally, it's nothing more than a fingerprint or shoe tread. Sometimes that's all that's needed.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The tiniest residue left at the scene can become a mark of distinction in the most singular and intimate of ways.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It's a 6-person tag team match up when Lana Star sends her fabulous team of Penelope Pink and Miami's Sweet Heat to fight The Tonga Twins and Tiki Chamorro. The Beast must defend her championship title against Tormenta in the WOW Main Event.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Gigi Gianni and BK Rhythm take on Crystal Waters and Sandy Shore. It's Stephy Slays turn to battle one of Coach Campanelli's lackeys, Gloria Glitter. In the Main Event, Chainsaw and Siren The Voodoo Doll take on champions The Mother Truckers.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jessie Jones is back in the ring for a title shot against The Beast. Teammates Pep Riley and Sasha Sparks vie for a top spot in WOW as they fight Las Bandidas. A rematch is set WOW's biggest Australian Superheroes Genesis and Princess Aussie.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Top Tier has been dominating in the ring, but now they face the joint forces of Lil J-Boogie, Stephy Slays, and Ariel Sky who want to make them pay for their underhanded ways. In the Main Event, Tormenta faces former WOW Champion Penelope Pink.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Classmaster and a surprise partner, announced by Samantha Smart, take on the Fierce Sisters. Chantilly Chella and Holidead face off with Las Bandidas. In the Main Event, Lana Star challenges the culprits who ran up her hotel bill.

programme.title: WOW - Women of Wrestling: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Classmaster attempts to put Santana Garrett into detention as they battle in the ring. Also in action is Reina Del Rey, Sandy Shore, Holidead, Genesis and Katarina Jinx. The action heats up and still, so many questions surround WOW.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is hired by a man to deliver ten thousand dollars. Paladin has to sift through a numbr of suspects, including a band of gypsies and the men who found the body.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: New Mexico rancher Jesse Reade hires Paladin for $1,000 to bring back outlaw Dave Enderly, who has run off to Perdido, Mexico with Reade's daughter Nancy.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Manfred Holt breaks out of jail, killing two deputies. Is he on his way to kill the banker who testified against him, or to see his family for the last time?

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: A sportsman sponsors a contest, betting that no one can elude his posse in the Mojave Desert. When Paladin shows up riding a camel, the man decides that the only way he can still win is to get rid of Paladin.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: At a stagecoach stop, Paladin sees a peaceful Cherokee rancher being beaten by men who think his cattle are spreading a sickness.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: An accused murderer who fears that he will be executed before he can be returned for trial, hires Paladin to make sure he gets there alive.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: A beggar who was once a circus performer bets a gambler that he can walk across the saloon on a tightrope. When Paladin sees that the gambler intends to cheat, he decides to help even the odds.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Convicted of murder, Vince Harper breaks jail and seeks refuge with an old friend: Editor Claibourne. Believing in Harper's innocence, the editor agrees to hide him until he can uncover new evidence, leading Sheriff Hollister to strike a deal.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Santiago, a rebel leader mortally wounded in a battle with the despot Commandante Nexor, escapes across the border to Tombstone. He begs his old friend Clay to find his younger brother Juan and bring him to him. But Juan has plans of his own.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Sam Colby, one of a gang plotting to steal an Army payroll, comes to Tombstone to 'case' the job. But he discovers his ex-sweetheart, Sarah, is about to marry Lieutenant Crane, the commanding officer of the payroll's military escort.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Daggett, the Black Marshal from Deadwood, moves to Tombstone to settle down and raise chickens after an injury that leaves him defenseless. When two gunslingers ride into town looking for the ex-Marshal, he and Hollister face down the 'guns.'

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Sheriff Hollister (Pat Conway) captures murderer Milo Wade in a border town. He starts the cross-desert trek to Tombstone with his prisoner, but Milo's young brother intercepts the pair, leaving Hollister tied to a tree to die in the broiling sun.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Sheriff Hollister gives the job of the jailer to Barton Clark who has recently come West. The Sheriff brings Clark his first 'tenant,' a beautiful outlaw known as Rose of Rio Bravo with whom Clark falls in love, leading him to double-cross Hollister.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Sheriff Hollister rides to collect a prisoner, but the prisoner breaks jail before he arrives. The prisoner saves Hollister from an Apache ambush. But soon Hollister must pit his courage and fast gun against two desperate men.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Sheriff Hollister (Pat Conway) decides to go undercover to prevent editor Claibourne (Richard Eastham) from being murdered by a hitman who has been hired by a vengeful, local rancher whom the editor once helped to send to prison.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
